item.text: In the twenty-fifth year of our exile, at the beginning of the year, on the tenth day of the month, in the fourteenth year after the city was struck down, on this very day, the hand of the Lord was on me, and he brought me there.

By <st data-num="0430" class="">divine</st> <st data-num="04759" class="">visions</st><n id="1" /> he <st data-num="0935" class="">brought</st> me <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> of <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st> and <st data-num="05117" class="">placed</st> me <st data-num="0413" class="">on</st> a <st data-num="03966" class="">very</st> <st data-num="01364" class="">high</st> <st data-num="02022" class="">mountain</st>,<n id="2" /> and <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> it was a <st data-num="04011" class="">structure</st> like a <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st>, to the <st data-num="05045" class="">south</st>.

When he <st data-num="0935" class="">brought</st> me <st data-num="08033" class="">there</st>, I <st data-num="02009" class="">saw</st><n id="1" /> a <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st> whose <st data-num="04758" class="">appearance</st> was <st data-num="04758" class="">like</st> <st data-num="05178" class="">bronze</st>, with a <st data-num="06593" class="">linen</st> <st data-num="06616" class="">cord</st> and a <st data-num="04060" class="">measuring</st> <st data-num="07070" class="">stick</st> in his <st data-num="03027" class="">hand</st>. <st data-num="01931" class="">He</st> was <st data-num="05975" class="">standing</st> in the <st data-num="08179" class="">gateway</st>.

The man said to me, “Son of man, watch closely, listen carefully, and pay attention to everything I show you, for you have been brought here so that I can show it to you. Tell the house of Israel everything you see.”
I saw a wall all around the outside of the temple. In the man’s hand was a measuring stick 10½ feet long. He measured the thickness of the wall as 10½ feet and its height as 10½ feet.

Then he <st data-num="0935" class="">went</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="08179" class="">gate</st> <st data-num="0834 06440">facing</st> <st data-num="01870 06921">east</st>. He <st data-num="05927" class="">climbed</st> its <st data-num="04609" class="">steps</st> and <st data-num="04058" class="">measured</st> the <st data-num="05592" class="">threshold</st> of the <st data-num="08179" class="">gate</st> as <st data-num="0259" class="">10½</st> <st data-num="07070" class="">feet</st> <st data-num="07341" class="">deep</st>.<n id="1" />

The <st data-num="08372" class="">alcoves</st> were <st data-num="0259" class="">10½</st> <st data-num="07070" class="">feet</st> <st data-num="0753" class="">long</st> and <st data-num="0259" class="">10½</st> <st data-num="07070" class="">feet</st> <st data-num="07341" class="">wide</st>; <st data-num="0996" class="">between</st> the <st data-num="08372" class="">alcoves</st> were <st data-num="02568" class="">8¾</st> <st data-num="0520" class="">feet</st>.<n id="1" /> The <st data-num="05592" class="">threshold</st> of the <st data-num="08179" class="">gate</st> <st data-num="0681" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="0197" class="">porch</st> of the <st data-num="08179" class="">gate</st> facing <st data-num="01004" class="">inward</st> was <st data-num="0259" class="">10½</st> <st data-num="07070" class="">feet</st>.

Then he <st data-num="04058" class="">measured</st> the <st data-num="0197" class="">porch</st> of the <st data-num="08179" class="">gate</st> facing <st data-num="01004" class="">inward</st> as <st data-num="0259" class="">10½</st> <st data-num="07070" class="">feet</st>.

He <st data-num="04058" class="">measured</st> the <st data-num="0197" class="">porch</st> of the <st data-num="08179" class="">gate</st> as <st data-num="08083" class="">14</st> <st data-num="0520" class="">feet</st><n id="1" /> and its <st data-num="0352" class="">jambs</st> as <st data-num="08147" class="">3½</st> <st data-num="0520" class="">feet</st>;<n id="2" /> the <st data-num="0197" class="">porch</st> of the <st data-num="08179" class="">gate</st> faced <st data-num="01004" class="">inward</st>.

There were <st data-num="07969" class="">three</st> <st data-num="08372" class="">alcoves</st> <st data-num="06311 07969 06311">on each side</st> of the <st data-num="01870 06921">east</st> <st data-num="08179" class="">gate</st>; the <st data-num="07969" class="">three</st> had the <st data-num="0259" class="">same</st> <st data-num="04060" class="">measurement</st>, and the <st data-num="0352" class="">jambs</st> <st data-num="06311 06311">on either side</st> had the <st data-num="0259" class="">same</st> <st data-num="04060" class="">measurement</st>.<n id="1" />

He <st data-num="04058" class="">measured</st> the <st data-num="07341" class="">width</st> of the <st data-num="06607" class="">entrance</st> of the <st data-num="08179" class="">gateway</st> as <st data-num="06235" class="">17½</st> <st data-num="0520" class="">feet</st><n id="1" /> and the <st data-num="0753" class="">length</st> of the <st data-num="08179" class="">gateway</st> as <st data-num="07969 06240">22¾</st> <st data-num="0520" class="">feet</st>.<n id="2" />

There was a <st data-num="01366" class="">barrier</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">in front of</st> the <st data-num="08372" class="">alcoves</st>, <st data-num="0259 0259">1¾</st> <st data-num="0520 0520">feet</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="01366 06311">on either side</st>; the <st data-num="08372" class="">alcoves</st> were <st data-num="08337 08337">10½</st> <st data-num="0520 0520">feet</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="06311 06311">on either side</st>.

He <st data-num="04058" class="">measured</st> the <st data-num="08179" class="">gateway</st> from the <st data-num="01406" class="">roof</st> of one <st data-num="08372" class="">alcove</st> to the <st data-num="01406" class="">roof</st> of the other, a <st data-num="07341" class="">width</st> of <st data-num="06242 02568">43¾</st> <st data-num="0520" class="">feet</st><n id="1" /> from one <st data-num="06607" class="">entrance</st> to the <st data-num="05048" class="">opposite</st> <st data-num="06607" class="">one</st>.

He <st data-num="06213" class="">measured</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="0352" class="">porch</st><n id="2" /> at <st data-num="08346" class="">105</st> <st data-num="0520" class="">feet</st><n id="3" /> high;<n id="4" /> the <st data-num="08179" class="">gateway</st> went <st data-num="05439" class="">all</st> <st data-num="05439" class="">around</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="0352" class="">jamb</st> of the <st data-num="02691" class="">courtyard</st>.

<st data-num="05921" class="">From</st> the <st data-num="06440" class="">front</st> of the <st data-num="02978" class="">entrance</st> <st data-num="08179" class="">gate</st> <st data-num="05921 06440">to</st> the <st data-num="0197" class="">porch</st> of the <st data-num="06442" class="">inner</st> <st data-num="08179" class="">gate</st> was <st data-num="02572" class="">87½</st> <st data-num="0520" class="">feet</st>.<n id="1" />

There were closed windows toward the alcoves and toward their jambs within the gate all around, and likewise for the porches. There were windows all around the inside, and on each jamb were decorative palm trees.
Then he brought me to the outer court. I saw chambers there and a pavement made for the court all around; 30 chambers faced the pavement.

The <st data-num="07531" class="">pavement</st> was <st data-num="0413 03802">beside</st> the <st data-num="08179" class="">gates</st>, <st data-num="05980" class="">corresponding</st> to the <st data-num="0753" class="">length</st> of the <st data-num="08179" class="">gates</st>; this was the <st data-num="08481" class="">lower</st> <st data-num="07531" class="">pavement</st>.
Then he measured the width from before the lower gate to the front of the exterior of the inner court as 175 feet on the east and on the north.
He measured the length and width of the gate of the outer court that faces north.

Its <st data-num="08372" class="">alcoves</st>, <st data-num="07969 07969">three</st> <st data-num="06311 06311">on each side</st>, and its <st data-num="0352" class="">jambs</st> and <st data-num="0361" class="">porches</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">had</st> the same <st data-num="04060" class="">measurement</st> as the <st data-num="07223" class="">first</st> <st data-num="08179" class="">gate;</st> <st data-num="02572" class="">87½</st> <st data-num="0520" class="">feet</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0753" class="">long</st> and <st data-num="02568 06242">43¾</st> <st data-num="0520" class="">feet</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="07341" class="">wide</st>.

Its <st data-num="02474" class="">windows</st>, its <st data-num="0361" class="">porches</st>, and its <st data-num="08561" class="">decorative palm trees</st> had the same <st data-num="04060" class="">measurement</st> as the <st data-num="08179" class="">gate</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">faced</st> <st data-num="01870 06921">east</st>. <st data-num="07651" class="">Seven</st> <st data-num="04609" class="">steps</st> <st data-num="05927" class="">led up</st> to it, and its <st data-num="0361" class="">porch</st> was <st data-num="06440" class="">in front of</st> them.
Opposite the gate on the north and the east was a gate of the inner court; he measured the distance from gate to gate at 175 feet.
Then he led me toward the south. I saw a gate on the south. He measured its jambs and its porches; they had the same dimensions as the others.

There were <st data-num="02474" class="">windows</st> <st data-num="05439" class="">all</st> <st data-num="05439" class="">around</st> it and its <st data-num="0361" class="">porches</st>, like the <st data-num="02474" class="">windows</st> of the <st data-num="0428" class="">others</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="02572" class="">87½</st> <st data-num="0520" class="">feet</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="0753" class="">long</st> and <st data-num="02568 06242">43¾</st> <st data-num="0520" class="">feet</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="07341" class="">wide</st>.

There were <st data-num="07651" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="04609" class="">steps</st> <st data-num="05930" class="">going up to</st> it; its <st data-num="0361" class="">porches</st> were <st data-num="06440" class="">in front of</st> them. It had <st data-num="08561" class="">decorative palm trees</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">on</st> its <st data-num="0352" class="">jambs</st>, <st data-num="0259 06311 0259 06311">one on either side</st>.
The inner court had a gate toward the south; he measured it from gate to gate toward the south as 175 feet.
Then he brought me to the inner court by the south gate. He measured the south gate; it had the same dimensions as the others.

Its <st data-num="08372" class="">alcoves</st>, its <st data-num="0352" class="">jambs</st>, and its <st data-num="0361" class="">porches</st> had the same <st data-num="04060" class="">dimensions</st> as the <st data-num="0428" class="">others</st>, and there were <st data-num="02474" class="">windows</st> <st data-num="05439" class="">all</st> <st data-num="05439" class="">around</st> it and its <st data-num="0361" class="">porches</st>; its <st data-num="0753" class="">length</st> was <st data-num="02572" class="">87½</st> <st data-num="0520" class="">feet</st><n id="1" /> and its <st data-num="07341" class="">width</st> <st data-num="06242 02568">43¾</st> <st data-num="0520" class="">feet</st>.<n id="2" />

There were <st data-num="0361" class="">porches</st> <st data-num="05439" class="">all</st> <st data-num="05439" class="">around</st>, <st data-num="02568 06242">43¾</st> <st data-num="0520" class="">feet</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0753" class="">long</st> and <st data-num="02568" class="">8¾</st> <st data-num="0520" class="">feet</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="07341" class="">wide</st>.
Its porches faced the outer court, and decorative palm trees were on its jambs, and its stairway had eight steps.
Then he brought me to the inner court on the east side. He measured the gate; it had the same dimensions as the others.

Its <st data-num="08372" class="">alcoves</st>, its <st data-num="0352" class="">jambs</st>, and its <st data-num="0361" class="">porches</st> had the same <st data-num="04060" class="">dimensions</st> as the <st data-num="0428" class="">others</st>, and there were <st data-num="02474" class="">windows</st> <st data-num="05439" class="">all</st> <st data-num="05439" class="">around</st> it and its <st data-num="0361" class="">porches;</st> its <st data-num="0753" class="">length</st> was <st data-num="02572" class="">87½</st> <st data-num="0520" class="">feet</st><n id="1" /> and its <st data-num="07341" class="">width</st> <st data-num="02568 06242">43¾</st> <st data-num="0520" class="">feet</st>.<n id="2" />
Its porches faced the outer court, it had decorative palm trees on its jambs, and its stairway had eight steps.
Then he brought me to the north gate, and he measured it; it had the same dimensions as the others—

its <st data-num="08372" class="">alcoves</st>, its <st data-num="0352" class="">jambs</st>, and its <st data-num="0361" class="">porches</st>. It had <st data-num="02474" class="">windows</st> <st data-num="05439" class="">all</st> <st data-num="05439" class="">around</st> it; its <st data-num="0753" class="">length</st> was <st data-num="02572" class="">87½</st> <st data-num="0520" class="">feet</st><n id="1" /> and its <st data-num="07341" class="">width</st> <st data-num="02568 06242">43¾</st> <st data-num="0520" class="">feet</st>.<n id="2" />
Its jambs faced the outer court, and it had decorative palm trees on its jambs on either side, and its stairway had eight steps.
There was a chamber with its door by the porch of the gate; there they washed the burnt offering.

In the <st data-num="0197" class="">porch</st> of the <st data-num="08179" class="">gate</st> were <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="07979" class="">tables</st> <st data-num="06311 08147 07979 06311">on either side</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">on</st> which to <st data-num="07819" class="">slaughter</st> the <st data-num="05930" class="">burnt offering</st>, the <st data-num="02403" class="">sin offering</st>, and the <st data-num="0817" class="">guilt offering</st>.

<st data-num="0413" class="">On</st> the <st data-num="03802 02351">outside</st> of the porch as one <st data-num="05927" class="">goes up</st> at the <st data-num="06607" class="">entrance</st> of the <st data-num="06828" class="">north</st> <st data-num="08179" class="">gate</st> were <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="07979" class="">tables</st>, and <st data-num="0413" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="0312" class="">other</st> <st data-num="03802 0834">side</st> of the <st data-num="0197" class="">porch</st> of the <st data-num="08179" class="">gate</st> were <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="07979" class="">tables</st>.

<st data-num="0702" class="">Four</st> <st data-num="07979" class="">tables</st> were <st data-num="06311 0702 07979 06311">on each</st> <st data-num="03802" class="">side</st> of the <st data-num="08179" class="">gate</st>, <st data-num="08083" class="">eight</st> <st data-num="07979" class="">tables</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">on</st> which the <st data-num="07819" class="">sacrifices</st> were to be <st data-num="07819" class="">slaughtered</st>.

The <st data-num="0702" class="">four</st> <st data-num="07979" class="">tables</st> for the <st data-num="05930" class="">burnt offering</st> were of <st data-num="01496" class="">carved</st> <st data-num="068" class="">stone</st>, <st data-num="0259 02677">32</st> <st data-num="0520" class="">inches</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0753" class="">long</st>, <st data-num="0259 02677">32</st> <st data-num="0520" class="">inches</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="07341" class="">wide</st>, and <st data-num="0259" class="">21</st> <st data-num="0520" class="">inches</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="01363" class="">high</st>. They would <st data-num="03240" class="">put</st> the <st data-num="03627" class="">instruments</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> they used to <st data-num="07819" class="">slaughter</st> the <st data-num="05930" class="">burnt offering</st> and the <st data-num="02077" class="">sacrifice</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">on</st> them.
There were hooks 3 inches long fastened in the house all around, and on the tables was the flesh of the offering.
On the outside of the inner gate were chambers for the singers of the inner court, one at the side of the north gate facing south, and the other at the side of the south gate facing north.

He <st data-num="01696" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> me, “<st data-num="02090" class="">This</st> <st data-num="03957" class="">chamber</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> <st data-num="06440" class="">faces</st> <st data-num="01870 01864">south</st> is for the <st data-num="03548" class="">priests</st> who <st data-num="08104" class="">keep</st> <st data-num="04931" class="">charge</st> of the <st data-num="01004" class="">temple</st>,<n id="1" />
and the chamber that faces north is for the priests who keep charge of the altar. These are the descendants of Zadok, from the descendants of Levi, who may approach the Lord to minister to him.”
He measured the court as a square 175 feet long and 175 feet wide; the altar was in front of the temple.
Then he brought me to the porch of the temple and measured the jambs of the porch as 8¾ feet on either side; the width of the gate was 24½ feet, and the sides were 5¼ feet on each side.
The length of the porch was 35 feet and the width 19¼ feet; steps led up to it, and there were pillars beside the jambs on either side.
